remarks.format: ## Remarks A提供从针对数据源，查询返回的数据之间的主映射和。A provides a master mapping between the data returned from a query against a data source, and a . 名称可以代替了传递名称到`Fill`方法**DataAdapter**。The name can be passed in place of the name to the `Fill` method of the **DataAdapter**. 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 数据表和 DataColumn 映射](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，并将其添加到。The following example creates a object and adds it to a . 然后，它通知用户映射添加到集合，并显示其父映射。It then informs the user that the mapping was added to the collection and displays the parent mapping. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTableMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMapping Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTableMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTableMapping Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在，它返回的状态。If the exists, it is returned. 如果不存在，为给定，执行以下操作：If the does not exist, for a given , the following actions occur: |MissingMappingActionMissingMappingAction|执行操作Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|创建指定的源列名称与源列名称与列名称。Creates a with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the column name. 这不添加到集合。This is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|如果缺少指定的列映射，则生成 。An is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|获取一个 null 值。Gets a null value.|
